mapper.select: select a.userid, a.cp, a.carinfo, c.aucode from ( select userid, cp, carinfo, bid from cp_list ) a, ( select userid, max(bid) as m_bid from cp_list where userid in (select userid from user_id_list where userid = #{userId} and userpw = #{userPass}) group by userid ) b, ( select userid, aucode from user_id_list ) c where a.userid = b.userid and a.bid = b.m_bid and a.userid = c.userid
